example.text: To make matters worse, Biden began depleting our Strategic Petroleum Reserve , which is meant for national emergencies, by selling our reserve to foreign adversaries like the Chinese Communist Party . These actions resulted in even further energy constraints and the lowest reserve level in nearly four decades .

With the ever-growing hostilities and threats being made by the Chinese Communist Party, Congress began taking action under Republican leadership. This week, we passed our first bi-partisan bill by establishing a select Committee on China.

This past fall, House Republicans laid out our Commitment to America in preparation for a GOP majority. My Republican colleagues and I got to work this week to deliver on our promises to the American people and will continue to do so for the next two years.

Mr. Speaker, this WOTUS, waters of the US, never have I heard such a clamor from my farmers. This is such an insult, and it shows just simply how out of touch those that would propose something like this are when it is related to my farmers and the farmers throughout the United States.

The [[user]]'s 7(a) program provides loans to small businesses without taxpayer subsidy, but recently they issued new rules causing significant bipartisan concern. It’s baffling that the SBA continues ignoring concerns from Congress while potentially putting tax dollars at risk. [[url]]

Securing our energy independence must remain a top priority. Doing so means protecting the American people & our economy from shifting geopolitical threats. I was happy to address this topic at the Washington Energy Summit. Thank you to [[user]] for the invitation. [[url]]

Thank you to [[user]] International for hosting an event on Capitol Hill today to discuss the future of the US battery industry. My USA Batteries Act would make the US battery industry more competitive by repealing a tax that gives foreign companies an unfair advantage. [[url]]
